text: The Bohdan Markevych Stadium is a sports stadium in Vynnyky, Ukraine. It is the home field for FC Rukh Vynnyky. Named after the youth coach Bohdan Markevych. In honor of Bohdan Markevych (1925–2002) a bronze monument that was supposed to delineate the coach teaching his son Myron football was erected as a tribute and memorial. The stadium hosted the football representative tournament of the Ukrainian Army. ==References== Category:Football venues in Lviv
title: Bohdan Markevych Stadium
